Fields.GarbageHat_Description: It's a metal bin lid 'upcycled' into a hat...
Fields.GoblinMask_Description: Freak out the neighbourhood with this creepy mask. Rubber ear joints for effect.
Fields.WatermelonBand_Description: The colour scheme was inspired by the beloved summer melon.
Fields.WearableDwarfHelm_Description: A slightly larger, human sized version of the helmets worn by dwarfs.
Fields.BluebirdMask_Description: Wear this to look just like your favourite island trader.
